about.title: About
about.description: I am a full stack developer with a passion for building web applications, proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, React and Laravel

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Programming languages, frameworks, libraries, tools, and platforms I have experience with

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A showcase of web applications I have personally developed

laravel-construction-site-manager.description: Web application for managing construction sites and workers, featuring a React+Vite frontend with Material UI and a Laravel backend.

next-js-simple-blog-spot.description: Blog application built with Next.js and Prisma, enabling users to create, comment on, and explore posts.

pizero.1: Developed both frontend and backend features for management web applications, using PHP for backend logic and JavaScript with Bootstrap for responsive interfaces
pizero.2: Enhanced an existing React Native application by implementing new features and improvements
pizero.3: Developed an administrative management interface with Laravel and Vuexy, enabling admin users to upload, manage, and remove content efficiently
pizero.4: Implemented frontend functionality for an AI-driven web application using Laravel with Livewire and Volt
pizero.5: Gained experience with Parallel Desk, Slack e ClickUp, collaborating effectively within a team environment

its.1: Acquired solid foundations in Python and web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
its.2: Developed a practical understanding of full-stack application architecture, covering frontend, backend, APIs, and database integration
its.3: Gained hands-on experience with frameworks such as Django, React, and Laravel
its.4: Worked with development and testing tools including Postman, Git and Github
its.5: Built basic knowledge of containerization (Docker), cloud concepts, and Internet of Things (IoT) technologies
